item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This guide goes through installation and a provides a basic example. Downloading Break Break is available on NPM and can be downloaded using NPM and Yarn. $ npm add --save-dev @lkummer/break $ yarn add --dev @lkummer/break Note the library is built for libsass. Node binding is available on NPM as node-sass. Importing Break Break can now be imported in SCSS files in your project. @import 'break'; Basic Example Breakpoints are defined by a map which contains a key for each breakpoint.

item.title: Mixins
item.description: Documentation of all the mixins available in Break. Media Query Mixins All breakpoint media query mixins use a $breakpoints map. The structure of the map is described in the Getting Started guide. The following breakpoint map is used in all of the examples on this page. $breakpoints: ( 'small': ( 'lower': null, 'upper': 400px ), 'medium': ( 'lower': 401px, 'upper': 800px ), 'large': ( 'lower': 801px, 'upper': 1200px ), 'huge': ( 'lower': 1201px, 'upper': null ) ); breakpoint($lower-key, $upper-key, $breakpoints) Places a @content block inside a media query enabled beteen the selected breakpoints.
